name: Siren's Wharf
description:
Scavenge the ruins of an abandoned underwater theme park, crawling with bloodthirsty inhabitants.

A park shut down in it’s heyday becomes legend amongst amusement park fanatics. Spurred by rumors of valuable treasure and collector’s items, you travel to the now abandoned park in the middle of the ocean in search of it’s most valuable prize.  Whispers among the fandom speak of a hidden Pearl in Siren's Wharf that's ripe for the taking.  Forums buzz with comments suggesting that  none of the other enthusiasts who’ve gone looking have ever returned. Can you find the Pearl and make it back to tell the tale?

Siren's Wharf is a short (10-20 minute) experience created as part of the HauntedPS1 Summer of Shivers 2021 game jam. The main theme we chose was "Submechanophobia", or the fear of submerged man-made objects. The only other guideline was to design a game in a retro-PS1 style.

Code/Design/Audio - https://twitter.com/entropy_phi | https://entropyphi.itch.io/
Art/Writing - https://twitter.com/GrayXOrchid | https://grayxorchid.itch.io/

If you're interested in much longer, more polished games similar to this, check out Ad Infernum (our upcoming project) or Heliophobia (our previous project).
